Posts.Content: hi ladies thanks 4 yr replys im going to fone hosp in morn try n get an app sorted out im goin to sound realy stupid now but im not even sure wat biops i had using ultrasound she made a small insicion and  did about 3 needle biops the needle got thicker each time she also did 2 with a clicky needle thing then 1 under my arm which bloody hurt the needle had a long tube coming from it and was attatched to a shringe mayb thats y iv had to wait so long realy sick of the waitin just want to no now x
Posts.Title: still waitin

Posts.Content: Hi thanks4 yr reply  the waitings def the worse just want to no wat if anything im facing once i no i can try n start to get my head round it x
Posts.Title: still waitin

Posts.Content: hi foned breast clinic this morn just after 9 couldnt tel me results over fone, got told i had an app in post 4 the 26th i asked 4 an earlier app as i wasnt copin too well n pointed out that the 26th would b 4 weeks since my biop she told me clinic was full this week but shed have a word with consultant n fone me back which she didnt do so i foned again at 3pm 4 times  n got the answer machine office hours r suposedto b 9til4.30 his sec only there mon wed n fri thinkin i should change hosp but dont think il get seen any faster now even if i do dont no wat to do the hosp im at now is ment to b a real good 4 cancer treatment x sue x
Posts.Title: still waitin

Posts.Content: been 3 n 1/2 very long weeks of not been able to function right no concentration not sleepin breathin problems think due to stress of not knowin not good as i have 3 young children. saw doc on 21st aug who refered me urgently 4 tests i had mamo ultra n biops on aug 30th now 2 weeks agony waitin 4 results foned on wed but results wernt back said they would have them fri but to fone mon morn so they had time to discuss them also got told there was no clinic next week so would b week after. went to docs today got summat to help me sleep also gaveme something to help me through next couple of weeks he also foned clinic my results arnt back as there had been a delay in lab n didnt look like they had even been prosessed yet he also said it looked like hosp were gonna send me an app in post for sep26th which will b 1 day under 4 weeks since biops and strangley he said goin by ultrasound it didnt look like anythink sinister i say strangley as when i left consultant on 30th he said it was bad news it looked very much like cancer wish id never been to docs today now as my head is now even more messed up has anyone else had to wait this long 4 results x
Posts.Title: still waitin

Posts.Content: Hi thanks 4 yr reply im in e,yorkshire went to castle hill breast clinicin cottingham nr hull wondering if i should change hospitals my partners nan got seen n results straight away she went to york once i no wat if anything im facing il b able to start n tryto getmy head round it. thanks sue x

Posts.Content: hi how did u get on hope its not too bad sending hugs x
Posts.Title: first appointment

Posts.Content: hi so saw consultant to day who after examining n drawing on me sent me 4 mama ultrasound n biopsi took few samples from breast n pit quite sore now saw consultant again to b told its bad news looks very much like iv got it but got to wait 4 results to no wat action treatment to take said results could take up to 2 weeks but if not heard in 4 to get in touch bloody idiot if he thinks il wait 4 weeks b4 i fone il fone in 2 if not heard from them soooo scared now need to no how bad it is scared it might have spread just need to no wat hapens next wat treatment ect thanks 4 listening it helps x
Posts.Title: first appointment

Posts.Content: hi thanks 4 yr reply i foned cas today they said up to 2weeks 4 results.... not good .yeah my partners gonna cum with me luckly hes on hol this week n wen i go 4 results hel take day off hope youre doin ok n that treatment goin well x
Posts.Title: first appointment

Posts.Content: hi im in a similar situation found hard lump on aug19th got in at docs on 21st she refered me to breast clinic had app there aug30th 4 mama ultrasound n biopsi back in to consultants office gottold its bad news looks very much like breastcancer so now waitin 4 biopsi results to c wat grade ect just want to no wat happens next said results could take 2 weeks but if not heard in 4 to fone lol like im gonna wait 4 weeks b4 i fone do they even realise how srtessfull the waitin is 4 us all. hope everyones treatments goin well x
Posts.Title: Hi I'm new here...

Posts.Content: hi iv been scared ever since i found the lump 2 1/2 weeks ago not been able to think or focus on anything else, last few days though not really been thinkin of it as much its like iv shut it out compleatley then wen i do start to think about it i  try n shut it out again think iv gone into denial mode or something been havin few twinges to nite though like shootin stabbin pains only lasts few  seconds but painful just wish results would hurry up been a  week tomor n not heard owt they did say it could take up to 2weeks though but everyone else seems to get their results in a few days so gettin to me again now think im gonna fone hosp tomor i just want to no wats gonna happen next feel like my lifes on hold n as far as i can tel n by wat iv read on hear emotions up n down n cryin all time is perfectly normal iv not told anyone yet n feel likei want to but dont want to only tel em half of story dont want to worry anyone yet need to b able to tel em wat grade i have n wat treatment il need ect sorry to go on again but it helps hope u get good news on fri will b thinkin of u let us no wat happens good luck n take care x
Posts.Title: Hi I'm new here...

Posts.Content: thanks everyone for all youre lovely replys and words of support im glad to say im slowly startin to feel better about things n startin to get my fight back love n best wishes to everyone for a happy n health 2013 lets make it a good year wen we all kick its butt x sue x
Posts.Title: its spread so scared

Posts.Content: hi everyone not been on for a while just been tryin to get my head together think im finally ready to kick its arse again think iv got my fight back im feelin a lot better about things had a good christmas with my lovely little family we even managed to go out 4 a meal with friends on newyear eve then went on to another friends party had a real good nite think it did me good to get out n do something "normal" kids all loved it they had a great nite they love it wen they get to stay up late bless em.anyway i went on fri 11th jan for my first herceptin get to hosp at 9.30 but didnt think i was gonnna b able to have treatment as i hadnt had my steroids they didnt give me any day b4 wen i saw my onc n i forgot to ask about them luckily as my bloods were so good they were able to give me sum through cath just added about an hour to treatment time next i had the herceptin over hour n half then cold cap n t finaly aloud home at about 4.15 with my steroids for next few days n sum 4 next time 1st feb also waitin for date for scan in feb so hopefully will get these results b4 march treatments fingers crossed 4 shrinkage n im glad to say iv felt fine today no side effects so far. hope everyone doin ok n treatments all goin well x sue x
Posts.Title: its spread so scared

Posts.Content: hi had single mast n recon in oct was ment to b havin 3fec( had first on nov29) n 3 t followed by 3weeks of radio but results of scans show its spread to few spots on lungs n several on liver 2 of which r 2cm and in dif places so they cant operate so r hopin to shrink it with chemo which has now changed instead of the other2fec theyv put me straighton the t which i had first of yest then in jan should b havin t and herceptin dos any one no wat side effects to expect with the herceptin i cant stop cryin as wen i asked my onc about life expectancy she said average with wat im facing is only 3/4years she did say she also had patients 10 years on just so scared my kids r stil so young 5 nearly 7 n 8 and want to b around to c them grow up b4 got diagnosed with secondarys i was quite positive how do i get this back now facing this dont no how to get my fight back n need it more than ever now just feel like iv been given a death sentence as also got told its very agressive wont no if its started to shrink til next scan which isnt till around feb march just can tget my head round it  sooooooo scared sick of feelin like this n crying all time sorry for rant x sue x
Posts.Title: its spread so scared

Posts.Content: hi hope everyones doin well just wanted to let u all no how im gettin on had body scan last thurs they said theyd rush the results through so theyd b back for wen i c my onc tomor but been to hosp today as had a cold for over a week with bad cough and been feelin short of breath  bloods came back ok as did chest xray they sent me for gave me antibiotics to try n clear cough good news is i got my results a day early and so glad to say ITS SHRINKING :-)  x  just hope it keeps on doin lungs looked good not even sure now if it had spread there or if its remainds of a chest infection c my onc tomorow so can try n find out more n liver mets has shrunk gonna ask again tomor by how much n write it down so can compare again after next scan x sue x
Posts.Title: its spread so scared

Posts.Content: thanks everyone good luck for tomor my loading dose of herceptin was ok n i felt fine after se kicked in around day 5/6 but wernt too bad but as they started to cleat the T se kicked in lol never mind only got 3 more t then just herceptin to have got good results today lungs just have traces but one node effected was 13mm n now 11mm liver bigest on right side was 2.1 cm by 2.1 cm is now 1.8 cm by 1.4 cm n biggest on letf was 2.6 cm by 2.2 is now 1.8 cm by 1.6 cm  my onc n thedoc i saw yesday were both pleased with this so just hope it carrys on shrinkin hope everyone feelin ok tonite sendin love n hugs to everyone espesially those that need them the most try n stay strong n positive not always easy i no x sue x
Posts.Title: its spread so scared

Posts.Content: so sorry yr feeling like this wish i could do/say something to make u feel better n theres nothing wrong with feelin sorry 4 yr self i think yr entitled to having to go through all this shit sending u ((((((((((((((((((BIG HUGS)))))))))))))))))) sue x
Posts.Title: Feel like I am back at square one

Posts.Content: hi everyone thanks 4 yr replys n hope yr app went well today caroline x sue x
Posts.Title: results at last

Posts.Content: got my results today at last ( only been waitin for 4 weeks ) grade 2 got to have a full mastectomy on right side but should b able to have immediate recon think im gonna go 4 diep flap if theyl let me may as well get the free tummy tuck get summat good out of all this crap lol tryin to keep a sence of humour through all this to help me through got app week today to discuss options n op should b b4 23rdoct dont no if in lymph nodes yet was showin sum there but they wasnt sure if it was lymph node theyd taken or the lump as sample was too small x
Posts.Title: results at last

Posts.Content: hi thanks 4 reply yes its helpt alot thanks gonn go get sum big knickers just in case n will get more sports bras n sum extenders also still need to front openin nighties i dont have that much longer to think about it i was diagnosed 2 weeks ago after waitin for results for 4weeks i went on tue9th 4 sentinal node biop they r rushing results through as theyv booked me in monday15th oct so movin fast now at last i live in east yorkshire n havin all treatments at castle hill in cottingham hope u continue to heal well n good luck in all other treatments u may need x thanks sue x
Posts.Title: home after masectomy

Posts.Content: hi glad it all went well 4 u n that yr doin well. i had lymphnode removed tue 9th there rushin results through n im havin mast n diep recon on monday 15th which recon did u have n which bras did u buy also do u have to wear pull in knickers hope u dont mind me askin this x
Posts.Title: home after masectomy

Posts.Content: Hi Anita I think it dos def depend on area u live n surgeon mine wanted to do imediate recon which i was pleased about wen i askd about it goin hard/lumpy after radio/chemo he said it wasnt a prob as could b sorted with further surgery mayb using lipo sculptering he said it was better to have recon at same time as less scaring which is ok with me just hope it works due to have it done on mon. hope u continue to do well take care x sue x
Posts.Title: home after masectomy

Posts.Content: thats bril so pleased for u not been on here for a while so glad i did tonite worth it just to read yr great news reading news like yourse gives hope to the rest of us. i have 2 more docotaxel to go and then will carry on with herceptin but  i had good news myself last week in that my mets r shrinking :-)  x sue x
Posts.Title: Done it !!

Posts.Content: hi so sorry to hear yr news but please dont feel alone in all this i had right mast with imediate diepflap recon in oct i was tryin to stay strong n positive n get on with treatment wen i found out just b4 christmas that it had spread to lungs n liver was so scared my kids r so young 5  7  8 sumhow iv managed to get my positivness back n today i got the best news since all this started last aug i had a body scan last weekk found out today its shrinkin i no its hard but try n stay positive n please dont feel alone sending hugs x sue x
